amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to add the text of Titles I - VI of the Protecting America's Wilderness and Public Lands Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds the text of Titles I - VI of the Protecting America's Wilderness and Public Lands Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A008) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 200 (Roll no. 273).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A008) pursuant to the rule.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
